string.value: Now that I have the Chinese Firecrackers with mysterious powers laden in it, the next stop for me is to go find a town where the ghosts are, and eliminate them with the firecrackers.
These Chinese Firecrackers with mysterious powers have to be set off near the ghosts. These ghosts are not necessarily easy to find, so I better keep my eyes open. \n\n#o9500197# #r#a85701##k
Awesome... this should bring peace and happiness to this year.

The Lunar New Year can't possibly start well with these ghosts appearing in towns. We need someone to bring the special firecrackers that can scare away the ghosts and bring peace. Can you scare away these ghosts for us?
I cannot stress this enough, but these ghosts are absolutely terrified of firecrackers, especially when they make those earth-shaking explosions.

I wonder if you are afraid of the ghosts... since you already have the Chinese Firecrackers with mysterious powers, I encourage you to summon the courage to set it off near the ghosts and put it to good use.
Only the Chinese Firecrackers with mysterious powers may scare away the ghosts. Have you done your part to bring peace to the Lunar New Year?
Thank you. Your work is sure to bring peace to those that are ready to embrace the new year in a clean slate...
What? You're scared of the ghosts?
